actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the construction and maintenance of a rock breakwater.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct and maintain a rock breakwater to protect a marina located on Fort Peck Lake, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the construction and maintenance of a rock breakwater.
